Developer Documentation¶

glance_api.modules.functions¶

This module contains Classes and helpers for the API

class glance_api.modules.functions.Item(session)[source]¶

manages database access

delete(id)[source]¶

deletes item from database.

id: primary key of database item,

get(id=None, query=None, filter=None, filter_people=None)[source]¶

get item(s).

id: primary key of database item, None returns all filter: item_type of database item, limit results to item_type

patch(kwarg)[source]¶

updates asset fields using user data

post(kwarg)[source]¶

post item to database.

kwarg: dict. user data to process. return: new Item object

glance_api.modules.functions.jsonify(query)[source]¶

Converts raw database objects to json/dict.

glance_api.modules.functions.validate_account(session, **kwarg)[source]¶

Checks database to see if users credentials are correct.

Parameters:
  • session – ‘sqlalchemy.orm.session.Session’.
  • kwarg –
  • username – str.
  • password – str.
Return type:

bool

glance_api.modules.models¶

This module describes the database using sqlalchemy. declaritive.

class glance_api.modules.models.Collection(**kwargs)[source]¶

class glance_api.modules.models.Image(**kwargs)[source]¶

Item Table Master table. Item types inherit from Item.
